name: [ALPHA] Arena Shooter (Working title)
description:
This is a very early prototype. Expect things to be buggy and/or not work properly. And don't expect too much.

Want to help shape up the game to become absolutely amazing? Send me some feedback and suggestions!

You can reach me through twitter over at http://twitter.com/krognol or you can send me an email: krognoltwitch@gmail.com

The game community is also a good place to reach me!

I forgot to mention that there's a fullscreen option. (It doesn't work. Yet...)
